description:
Higher-end recreational boots that are warm and comfortable on longer tours. They offer control and performance when conditions get rough or unpredictable. The high-cuff construction gives you mobility and stability to ride in the tracks or break new trails.

  • Thermoformable liner for a customized, comfortable fit, soft-touch inner
  • Active heel support gives you extra power and improved control
  • High cuff provides support and stability for breaking trail
  • Speed-lock lacing with a lace cover to keep out snow
  • Reinforced toe-box and midsole add durability
  • Narrower female-specific fit offers good control and comfort
name: Rossignol XC-5 FW Classic Boots - Women's
